params._amount: The amount of tokens received at this contract through the cross-chain bridge.        the contract that implements this contract can safely assume that the tokens will arrive before this        function is called.
params._executor: Address who called the MessageBus execution function
params._message: Arbitrary message bytes originated from and encoded by the source app contract
params._sender: The address of the source app contract
params._srcChainId: The source chain ID where the transfer is originated from
params._token: The address of the token that comes out of the bridge

params._amount: The amount of tokens received at this contract through the cross-chain bridge.        the contract that implements this contract can safely assume that the tokens will arrive before this        function is called.
params._executor: Address who called the MessageBus execution function
params._message: Arbitrary message bytes originated from and encoded by the source app contract
params._sender: The address of the source app contract
params._srcChainId: The source chain ID where the transfer is originated from
params._token: The address of the token that comes out of the bridge

params._amount: The amount of the original transfer
params._executor: Address who called the MessageBus execution function
params._message: The same message associated with the original transfer
params._token: The token address of the original transfer

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params._receiver: receiver address on dest chain, arbitrary bytes

totalFee(uint64,address,uint256).details: we assume if dst chain address are bytes, user and nft are same length, otherwise we need to add receiver to args

params._id: token ID to bridge (need to get accurate tokenURI length)

returns._0: total fee needed for user tx

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

destBridge(uint64).notice: per dest chain id NFTBridge address

destBridge2(uint64).notice: only for non-evm chains and address can't fit 20bytes

destNFTAddr(address,uint64).notice: first key is NFT address on this chain, 2nd key is dest chain id, value is address on dest chain

destTxFee(uint64).notice: per dest chain id executor fee in this chain's gas token

executeMessageWithTransfer(address,addre.notice: Called by MessageBus (MessageBusReceiver) if the process is originated from MessageBus (MessageBusSender)'s         sendMessageWithTransfer it is only called when the tokens are checked to be arrived at this contract's address.

executeMessageWithTransferFallback(addre.notice: Only called by MessageBus (MessageBusReceiver) if         1. executeMessageWithTransfer reverts, or         2. executeMessageWithTransfer returns ExecutionStatus.Fail

executeMessageWithTransferRefund(address.notice: Called by MessageBus (MessageBusReceiver) to process refund of the original transfer from this contract

origNFT(address).notice: only set to true if NFT addr on this chain is the orig, so we will use deposit/withdraw instead of burn/mint. not applicable for mcn nft (always burn/mint)

sendTo(address,uint256,uint64,address).notice: locks or burn user's NFT in this contract and send message to mint (or withdraw) on dest chain

sendTo(address,uint256,uint64,bytes).notice: locks or burn user's NFT in this contract and send message to mint (or withdraw) on dest chain

totalFee(uint64,address,uint256).notice: totalFee returns gas token value to be set in user tx, includes both msg fee and executor fee for dest chain
